snippet.title: Hellblusser - coming soon!
snippet.description:
Hellblusser is a game made for the Sokpop Patreon, it was set to release in July, but is delayed to early August.

Don't worry: if you were a patron in July, you will be able to claim the game when it comes out through the Patreon Access page: https://sokpop.co/patreon_access/

Hellblusser is a fast-paced rogue-like game, you play as a young prince who is sent by the moon to extinguish the fires of hell. On your way to hell you use your sword and fire magic to beat various enemies. There's also a bit of subtle character customization, as you can obtain items and blessings in a run, which will alter the way the character plays! 

The game will be available on Itch.io & Steam!

Links:
Sokpop Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sokpop
Hellblusser on Itch.io: https://sokpop.itch.io/hellblusser
Hellblusser on Steam: will follow later!
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/invite/Ye3HrWW
